recipe.ingredients: - avocados: 2 (ripe, peeled, and cubed) - chickpeas: 1 can (15 ounces, rinsed and drained) - cherry tomatoes: 1 cup (halved) - cucumber: 1 medium (diced) - red onion: 1/4 cup (finely chopped) - parsley: 1/4 cup (chopped) - lemon juice: 3 tablespoons - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Vegetables: In a large bowl, combine the cubed avocados, rinsed chickpeas, halved cherry tomatoes, diced cucumber, and finely chopped red onion. 2. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper. 3. Combine and Toss: Pour the dressing over the avocado and vegetable mixture and toss gently to coat all ingredients. 4. Add Herbs and Serve: Add chopped parsley to the salad and mix it gently. Serve immediately to prevent avocados from browning.
